formattedAddress: 329 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 329 W 20th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Michael Ruggierio took charge of revealing the hidden beauty of our overgrown property in the estate section Riverdale in the Bronx. His focus was on preservation rather than removal and replanting. With his keen eye and hands-on approach, he quickly opened sightlines to dramatically increase the sense of spaciousness. The striking geology that lay buried in undergrowth was once again featured. The original plantings of the estate were also once more highlighted. The forty-seven trees on the property were treated with care and attention. Our family gained an education and greater appreciation from Michael for the natural beauty that we are fortunate enough to now properly care for.

originalText.text: After searching for a skillful Arborist for a while, thankfully I found HLine Consulting Arborist; the only one I really felt comfortable to hire because of the knowledge and experience. Michael made it possible for us to win a Law suit that involved several damaged trees. Iam very grateful.

originalText.text:
Michael Victor Ruggiero, is a highly trained and creative landscape architect who knows trees and plants better than anyone!
His knowledge of indigenous and sustainable plant materials, and keen eye for composition, transformed my property beyond my wildest dreams!
As I live outside the city, Michael suggested I go into town to see some of his projects; I was excited to see that the skills he exhibited on my project were fully realized, resulting in a gorgeous urban setting.
So, for an organized natural look, as on the High Line, or a stunning ordered arrangement, I highly recommend Michael Ruggiero
Michael Stromar
Michael Francis Stromar Designs     interiors, furniture, and accesories

originalText.text: As someone who has worked professionally with Michael Ruggiero - as well as viewing his private work, it's clear that he is an exceptional landscape architect who has a broad and deep level of experience  in placemaking, site planning and design, and plant knowledge - which is second to none.  His work harmonizes with its surroundings and seeks to accent the assets of its site and is performed with a clear focus on maintenance and sustainability.   He has designed important public spaces in NYC and the region as well as contributing his unique and painterly vision to the articulation of private gardens and estate landscaping.  His personal dedication and attention to detail is second to none when it comes to completing his designs.  I highly Recommend Mr. Ruggiero.

originalText.text:
The High Line Arborist has pruned the trees in my Chelsea, NY back yard and the privets out front to very pleasing effect.  He has also reconfigured landscape elements in my garden with new plantings, a new sitting area and an enlarged fish pond.   He works efficiently and effectively.   I am very pleased with the work he has done for me as well as the work he does around the neighborhood on bike lane tree pits and in the garden at St. Peter's church.

Paul Bodden
